items.title: Suspect in Tennessee quadruple killing captured after week on the run
items.description: A manhunt for the suspect in the Tennessee kidnappings and killings of four people, including three from the same family, ended Tuesday, police said.

items.title: 2 dead and 58 sick from growing Legionnaires' disease cluster in New York City
items.description: Two people have died and at least 58 people have been diagnosed with Legionnairesâ€™ disease in a cluster that broke out in New York City last week.

items.title: WATCH:  Two men jump into rushing water to save stranded monkey
items.description: Two men in India sprang into action when they spotted a stranded monkey in a rushing river.
